plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fantasy, as many of the books listed are fantasy novels. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be adventure, as many of the books listed involve a protagonist on a quest or facing challenges. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional world, as many of the books listed are set in imaginary places. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive, as many of the books listed are richly detailed. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as many of the books listed are full-length novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be magic and fantasy, as many of the books listed involve magical elements. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be fast-paced, as many of the books listed involve action and adventure. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as many of the books listed switch between multiple character perspectives. The user's favourite themes are likely to be adventure, magic, and coming-of-age.
